post.body: ps, your post reminded me...did YOU take your pills this morning?
I totally love how you left my position out of your list :P
got it. posted.
i've never actually used google groups...how are they?
yeah, forum it up.
well we can't really do top 5 lulz for 2009....
Soooo "The Top 5 Retarded Ideas of 2008" :p
...speaking about the top five items in the topic of choice?.... I'll make a list of the current top five's of things...
i was thinking more or so a top 5 for mini digies and the next time, a top 5 for dslr's...
Awesome! thanks Brio!! lulz..king of the blank...this could be interesting...
I could do a top 5 list type segment or something?
good idea! since having host switching would un-orderly. Plus, I think @dejong should get up on that blank of the blank!!
weeeoo!!!! I heart the basement!
yeah, 'member i talked to you about the noob's guide to buying digital cameras.... or I'm sure me and someone can talk dslr's
no, i took my pills...I'm just in a good mood lately :)
I'll be there.....with a topic.... can I do my camera one this time?
OOOOhhhhhh man...the HEAT is AAawwwnnnn!!!!!
...ok...why is there a lock beside your name?
i think my headphones are evil...they hurt my little ears after a while... I need new ones...
....I just realize my last tweet sounded slightly nerdy of me....lulz
